content: Created the metrics feature and it was awesome!
The Experiences/Strategies tab was made like super quickly
Commit when making substantial changes to content.  It will save the sqlite db file.
Save every little tiny thing AI gets right because it might not get it right again if you need to redo it.
Getting noticed with the Pump out of the gym.  Either the pump or my clothes for some reason.
Held eye contact with that girl, she was the perfect height.  Working out is working.
Swap the lucozade out for something else like coconut water.  Imagine losing 70g of fat instead.
Update tips.txt and get it to read it often or it will repeat the same mistakes
Vegetables like broccoli and spinach really fill you up
If you didn't do resistance exercise and walked less than 7k steps, you need to eat less carbs period.
The girl needs to get to know you to feel comfortable. Name, your personality, what you do, maybe ambition, before you ask her out.
Need to keep the conversation going.  It's your responsibility to do this and keep it interesting.

Everything must be done in the right order, because if it's not, you take the responsibility for putting her in a position where she has to reject you, even though she might want to take a chance on you if you did it right.
